name: Game of 15
author: Danilo Franceschini

sections.description:
Shortcode to add game of 15

Useful shortcode to a simple game on your page or posts

[gameof15]

This shortcode add a javascript function that add a Game of 15 on your posts. You can set a background-image and the color of the numbers. [gameof15 immagine=“url”] to add an image of background IMPORTANT: image size: 400×400 [gameof15 color=“#000000”] to change the color of the numbers. [gameof15 immagine=“url” color=“#000000”] to add an image and change the color.

Credits

This plugin is created by Danilo Franceschini.
